ygData.subject: Re: UNSUB-FUCKING-SCRIBE
ygData.msgSnippet: ... You mean the only place I ever got killed in South Ro? Yeah, I found a killer - literally - exploit. Ok, I was unprepared. I had gone there a few times on
ygData.messageBody:
According to Tom Bratina:
> friendly fyi: watch the stuff in south ro by the oasis zone border. it's not
> only "cheesy", but it's an exploit and you could get banned for it.

You mean the only place I ever got killed in South Ro? Yeah, I found a
killer - literally - exploit.

Ok, I was unprepared. I had gone there a few times on my way to Innothule
and it's stores of Netted and Woven... Never paid attention to what was
there, and never saw anything. Once, going over the dune, I got four
simultaneous messages:

A dry-bone skeleton casts a spell.
A dry-bone skeleton hits YOU for 21 damage.
You are stunned.
Your skin freezes all over.

Five seconds later, I was contemplating the skeletons (there was a ghoul too,
rushing toward me, but the skeletons got me first) from the usual sky vantage
one never wants to use...

--
